message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to make a counteroffer of $75.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $85.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $80 for the product.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob! However, I still need to make a reasonable profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $82.50.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $80 for the product.
